title: The Mandolin Player
marks: Signature and Sticker on back, in black ink: [Bertolino]
description: dark image of a man at left, seated and hunched over, wearing dark coat and hat, playing the mandolin; scratched wall; stone pavers; mounted on masonite
creditline: Gift of Susan Herzig and Paul Hertzmann, Paul M. Hertzmann, Inc., San Francisco, CA
